title: Nethermind Cancun Tracker
body:
| EIP	| PR | Merged
| ------------- | ------------- |  ------------- |
 [EIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153)|https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4126  | ✅ 
 [EIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844) |Multiple PRs, check https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/issues/4558
 [EIP-4788: Beacon block root in the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788) |https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/5476 |
 [EIP-5656: MCOPY - Memory copying instruction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5656) |https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/5791 | ✅ 
 [EIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780)| https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4704 | ✅ 

[Not confirmed] Engine API: Add getPayloadV3 with builder override flag:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/395/files)

Cancun in execution spec:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md

Cancun discussion thread:
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/cancun-network-upgrade-meta-thread/12060/9
